Title: Episode 3
Plot:
A documentary crew visits the hospital, exciting the creative juices in Alan and the bitter rivalry between Sue and Joanna.
Meanwhile, a tape of Guy being "intimate" with his mother is now in the possession of Sue who plays merry havoc with his and Joanna's life.
And is this the end for Angela as she falls for the charms of the director who's off to Toronto next week?
ParentalRatingReason: Offensive language, sexual material and other content that may offend
Writer: Fay Rusling, Gary Howe, James Henry, Oriane Messina
GuestStars: Darren Boyd, Peter McDonald, Simon London, Kier Charles, Li-Leng  Au, Rosie Alverez
